SEARCH
Package dat3.kino.services

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
dat3.kino.services.ReservationService
@Service public class ReservationService extends Object
Service class for managing reservations. It provides methods for creating, retrieving and calculating the price of reservations.

    • ReservationService

      Constructor for ReservationService. It initializes the repositories and services.
      Parameters:
      reservationRepository - Repository for managing reservation data.
      screeningRepository - Repository for managing screening data.
      userWithRolesRepository - Repository for managing user data.
      seatRepository - Repository for managing seat data.
      priceAdjustmentRepository - Repository for managing price adjustment data.
      seatService - Service for managing seat data.
      screeningService - Service for managing screening data.
      priceAdjustmentService - Service for managing price adjustment data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllReservations

      public List<Reservation> getAllReservations()
      Retrieves all reservations.
      Returns:
      A list of all reservations.

    • createReservation

      public ReservationResponse createReservation(ReservationRequest reservationRequest, String userId)
      Creates a new reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationRequest - The request object containing the details of the reservation to be created.
      userId - The ID of the user making the reservation.
      Returns:
      The created reservation.

    • getAllReservationsByUserName

      public List<ReservationResponse> getAllReservationsByUserName(String name)
      Retrieves all reservations made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      name - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of all reservations made by the specified user.

    • calculateReservationPrice

      public ReservationPriceResponse calculateReservationPrice(ReservationPriceRequest reservationPriceRequest)
      Calculates the price of a reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationPriceRequest - The request object containing the details of the reservation for which to calculate the price.
      Returns:
      The calculated price of the reservation.
